001.name: Karen
001.text: AI Initializing... Initialization complete. IRIS class AI ready for duty. Good morning, Captain.

002.name: Jack
002.text: Good morning, Karen, what do we have scheduled for today?

003.name: Karen
003.text: A standard scouting and raiding mission.

004.name: Jack
004.text: Well that sounds simple enough. Let's get to it then!

005.name: Karen
005.text: Wait a moment, Captain. We still have remaining funds from our previous run.

006.name: Karen
006.text: I would recommend using some of those funds to purchase upgrades prior to today's mission.

007.name: Jack
007.text: Want some more toys to play with, Karen? Alright, let's see what the mechanics have on sale.
